text: Colleagues () is a 1962 Soviet drama film directed by Aleksey Sakharov.Голос эпохиКинолекторий в Вешняках покажет сразу несколько фильмов == Plot == The film tells about three completely different, but close to each other graduates of the Leningrad Medical Institute, who will have to cope with all the difficulties of life, to preserve their ideals and friendship.Коллеги == Cast == * Vasily LivanovНародный артист Василий Лановой проведет творческую встречу в Ростове-на-Дону as Sasha Zelenin * Vasily Lanovoy as Aleksey Maksimov * Oleg Anofriyev as Vladka Karpov * Nina Shatskaya as Inna * Tamara Syomina as Dasha Guryanova * Rostislav Plyatt as Dampfer * Vladimir Kashpur as Sergei Yegorov * Vladimir Maruta as Makar IvanovichКоллеги (1962) Full Cast & Crew == References == == External links == * Category:1962 films Category:Russian- language films Category:Soviet drama films Category:Soviet films
title: Colleagues (film)
